title: Ternary 3D/2D/3D direct dual Z-scheme MOF-on-MOF-derived -Fe2O3/g-C3N4/Fe-MOF photocatalyst for boosted sunlight-driven removal of metronidazole: Effect of co-existing ions, mechanistic insights, and water matrices
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00610K, Paper
Anindita Bhuyan, Md. Ahmaruzzaman
A direct solid ternary dual Z-scheme photocatalyst, 3D/2D/3D -Fe2O3/g-C3N4/Fe-MOF (FCM), was fabricated for efficient removal of metronidazole (MTZ) under sunlight irradiation. About 98.5 % of 25 mg/L MTZ was effectively...
